API Reference¶

scrape.scrape_data(pages=2, max_entries=30000)[source]¶

Scrapes multiple pages from GradCafe and returns raw entries. Use main.py to limit the amount of scraped data. A hard cap (max_entries) prevents exceeding assignment limits.

load_data.clean_date(date_str)[source]¶

Converts dates like ‘January 31, 2026’ into YYYY-MM-DD format. Returns None if the date is missing or invalid.

load_data.clean_float(value)[source]¶

Extracts a numeric float from messy strings like ‘GPA 3.89’ from .json. Returns None if no valid number is found.

load_data.load_data(json_path)[source]¶

Opens the database, reads cleaned JSON, inserts every record into PostgreSQL.

load_data.strip_nul(value)[source]¶

Remove NUL bytes from strings.
